column2: lang=php1=$link = mysql_connect(host, user, password); or lang=php1=$db = new mysqli(host, user, password); or lang=php1=$db = new PDO('mysql:host=hostname;dbname=dbname', 'username', 'password');
column3: lang=php1=mysql_select_db(name, $link); or lang=php1=$db = new mysqli(host, user, password, name); or lang=php1=$db->select_db(name);
